donor_name: JOINT UNITED NATIONS PROGRAMME ON HIV/AIDS
outputs.output_descr:
1.	Building organizational capacities of networks of sexual minorities and PLHIVs for monitoring human rights programmes and redressal mechanisms.
2.	Developing and operationalizing a comprehensive national level policy on social protection for people living with HIV and most at risk population groups
3.	Providing technical support to legal and policy frameworks which ensure stigma free HIV responses and access to medicines

project_title: To improve the stigma free access to entitlements
